author: Clyde Hidershaj
comment: Works well. 2 minor things:   1 when activating voice search, the ZenWatch 3 goes through the app screen. It'd be nice if it was bypassed completely, if possible.   2 Google Now Cards cannot be assigned to a button. Again, if possible, it'd be a nice addition.   Still running version one of Android Wear.

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback. I tried to avoid the scrolling effect, it might not be possible. So far I was only able to test Android Wear 2.0 in my emulator, but good news there is no such animation there. Clyde: Please email me, I have questions about Google Now Feed. You can try the new beta version: please see bottom of Play Store page.

author: Joseph Rubin
comment: Useful idea! I'm sure a lot of people will find this useful

author: Seth Schroeder
comment: I would like to say this save you from needing to toggle to or say okay google. You are able to directly just talk to your watch which makes it less akward when out.  The one thing to note is that it took a while for this to show up on my watch but it did show up and was as simple as assigning it to one of the two button on my Zenwatch 3.

author: Jon Rajan
comment: Saves me the "ok Google"  step and opens up the speak now at the push of a button. Really useful
title: Great little app

author: Antwon Grainger
comment: App works as described looking forward to seeing what else is brought to the ZW3

reply.author: DYNA Logix
reply.content: Thank you! I am open to ideas. I already got a few pretty good tips, let's see if I can implement them :-)  Thank you for your support

title: Simple and to the point
